quest.name: Without a Trace
journal: There is a devilish glint in Guildmaster Severian's eye.

The guildmaster has a task of the utmost importance for you, his favorite assistant─delivering a report of some kind to someone in Revenant's Toll. As Severian has been rather light on details, speak with Deitrich to ascertain the who, what, and why.

Deitrich─unsurprised that the guildmaster has foisted the delivery onto you─explains that the intended recipient is one Wiltwaek. A member of the Adventurers' Guild charged with keeping the peace, Wiltwaek is currently investigating a crime in Mor Dhona. Some evidence left behind at the scene demanded Guildmaster Severian's expert eye, and the results of his analysis are what you must take to Revenant's Toll. Make your way there now with the certificate of appraisement.

You meet with Wiltwaek and his trusty companion Chanene. They inform you that a string of mysterious disappearances has plagued Revenant's Toll of late. Wiltwaek opens the certificate of appraisement and exclaims that alchemy is involved in these crimes. He further pronounces that you are to be his consultant on the case. Mystified, you listen as he reads aloud a note from Guildmaster Severian, praising you to the high heavens. As your expertise may not be needed at present, Wiltwaek bids you wait for further developments.

※The next alchemist quest will be available from Wiltwaek upon reaching level 53.
objectives: Deliver the certificate of appraisement to Wiltwaek in Revenant's Toll.

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: My favorite assistant! I have just the task for you. One of your alchemical prowess may scoff upon hearing it, but reserve your judgment─only you, who has touched the pinnacle of our art, can accomplish it.

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: I must ask you to deliver a report to a friend. Deitrich can help you with the minutiae─the who, the what, and so on. Now go, go!

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Deitrich, Deitrich, take it up with Deitrich!

dialogue.name: DEITRICH
dialogue.text: So he foisted it upon you, I see. Here is the certificate of appraisement for Wiltwaek.

dialogue.name: DEITRICH
dialogue.text: Did the guildmaster not...? No? <sigh> Why do I ask? Well, Wiltwaek is a member of the Adventurers' Guild, and responsible for keeping the peace in Revenant's Toll.

dialogue.name: DEITRICH
dialogue.text: He recently asked Master Severian to analyze evidence left behind at some crime scene. I just handed you the results.

dialogue.name: DEITRICH
dialogue.text: I think the guildmaster gave you the task because he could not be bothere─ Ahem. Excuse me. Because he trusts your skill as an alchemist.

dialogue.name: DEITRICH
dialogue.text: You shouldn't have any trouble finding Wiltwaek. He is a rather large fellow, and never goes anywhere without his assistant.

dialogue.name: CHANENE
dialogue.text: Hello, hello! In search of Wiltwaek? Well, you found him! He's right here.

dialogue.name: WILTWAEK
dialogue.text: I can't talk just now, misssir. I'm waiting for a letter from the Alchemists' Guild. Damned thing should've been here by now...

dialogue.name: WILTWAEK
dialogue.text: You're Severian's assistant? How do you do, friend? I'm Wiltwaek, and this is my companion, Chanene.

dialogue.name: WILTWAEK
dialogue.text: Now, what does your guildmaster...? Aha, just as I suspected─alchemy!

dialogue.name: WILTWAEK
dialogue.text: It's a queer business, this string of disappearances. There's some crew on the loose, I tell you!

dialogue.name: WILTWAEK
dialogue.text: But that's all we can say. They've stolen from sealed coffers and snatched men from locked rooms...but how? Why? We don't even have a clue what they do with their victims.

dialogue.name: WILTWAEK
dialogue.text: Though perhaps Severian has given us one. He identified our evidence as an alchemical catalyst. Whoever our villains, they're using your arts, friend. So it's a bloody good thing you're here to help!

dialogue.name: CHANENE
dialogue.text: ...You're just the messenger, aren't you? Will he be coming later, then─the consultant we asked for?

dialogue.name: WILTWAEK
dialogue.text: No, no, there's a note from Severian: “The womanman I've sent is the guild's finest. SheHe has earned my trust and admiration as an assistant, and I have no doubt shehe will be of the utmost help to you.”

dialogue.name: CHANENE
dialogue.text: Goodness me! A compliment from Master Severian is a compliment indeed!

dialogue.name: WILTWAEK
dialogue.text: Yes, we are happy to have you as our consulting alchemist. This case is just begun, and we will have need of your intellect soon. The game, Forename, is very much afoot!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next alchemist quest will be available from Wiltwaek upon reaching level 53.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The requirements for undertaking subsequent quests can be reviewed in your journal.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Your skills as an artisan would be put to great use in crafting collectables. Speak with Morgayne at Saint Reinette's Forum in Ishgard to learn more of this lucrative business opportunity.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you seek even greater tests of your crafting prowess, you would do well to acquire master recipes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with Guiding Star at Revenant's Toll to learn about them.
